jump_scares.spoiler: A man emerges from behind rock
The head of a dead man becomes visible
Wendy opens tent. Accompanied by sound effect
A quick jump-cut to a shot of the dead man’s face
A man startles Wendy
Several quick flashes of dead bodies face
Wendy turns to see the dead man standing beside her
A voice suddenly speak from the radio
A sound is heard in the distance
An unexpected sound is played
A man grabs Wendy’s leg
A bear appears behind Wendy
Mary looks down from the railings to the first floor, and gasps as the camera cuts to the strange man staring directly at her from downstairs
As Alice is looking at Margaret, there is a sudden cut to someone’s face in the darkness, and a male voice hums a melody
A sudden cut to some blurred imagery of lights in a darkened room
A sudden cut to footage of female dancers reflected in a distorted mirror
As Margaret’s husband pulls the curtain, there is a brief flash of some face with wide open eyes for 2 frames
A sudden cut to footage of twitching dancers in disturbing makeup
Another cut to the same footage of dancers in makeup, closer to the camera this time, as the eerie music becomes louder
Another cut to the same dancers in disturbing makeup, now up close and with one of them lunging at the camera. A second later, Alice wakes up from a nightmare
A sudden cut to a closeup of an opening eye
Another cut to the same eye
An extended creepy sequence of visions begins
A face in disturbing makeup suddenly appears in the foreground, and Alice jolts awake in the bathtub
A shark fin suddenly appears in the water next to the couple
The yacht’s boom hits the girl in the face, knocking her unconscious into the water
Benny suddenly turns around to see a severely attacked dead body
An animal bumps into the raft
Charlie has a flashback of a shark attack
Benny is pulled under the water
The shark suddenly rams the raft from underneath
Joji is pushed up out of the water by the shark
Joji is taken away quickly by the shark
A massive shark surfaces right next to the raft
Michelle suddenly grabs Kaz’s arm
A hammer suddenly strikes out of the hole in the wall

movies.title: Harvested 2 – The Legend of Harold Rice

jump_scares.spoiler: Girl appears in kitchen
Woman sleeping on couch and monster appears
Girl on her phone and monster appears behind her
Killer grabs a victim from behind
Killer stabs victim
A shadowy figure appears behind Meera
There is a loud gunshot
A barking dog lunges at the car window
A car horn sounds and a car crashes into Meera
Meera looks up to see a masked man pointing a gun at her
A hand suddenly knocks on the car window
A picture falls off a cabinet
Meera switches on a light to reveal a person tied to a chair
Christina suddenly wakes up and Meera screams
Meera turns around to run and immediately runs into Henry
Henry suddenly grabs Meera by the shoulder and throws her
Meera suddenly Strikes Henry from behind
The monster loudly slides the plate forward, disturbing the son’s thoughts
The monster’s hand grabs the son’s leg
The son, now with blood all over his face, lunges from the shadows towards the camera/mother
The masked man appears when she turns on the lights
Ma bangs on the window as the group are about to drive off
Some eggs are thrown at Ma’s car window
While in Ma’s bedroom, Haley and Maggie are startled by a girl holding a scary mask over her face
A girl is stabbed up through the bottom of her chin
The sound of a door slamming shut
Hiding under a car, Frank suddenly cuts a girl’s Achilles tendon as she comes close
Anna’s friend Martin is suddenly sliced with a cleaver through his mouth and face
Martin, who we presume is dead at the time, suddenly hits Frank with a baseball bat
As Frank opens his van door, Anna, presumed to be still out cold, suddenly stabs him
Fred opens the car trunk and the man inside jumps out and grabs him
A sudden sound of smashing dishes
As Maddox is in the water, a floating dead body bumps into her
The shower curtain is pulled aside revealing a person with long blonde hair holding a knife
A blonde woman runs toward Mr. Arbogast and attacks him with a knife
Lila turns around suddenly and gasps
Lila turns the chair around revealing a preserved dead body
Kaylee drops her flashlight and screams as Kevin comes back from the bathroom
A hand grabs the doorframe and Kaylee screeches
Kaylee’s eyeless and mouthless face suddenly appears on screen with a loud droning whine sound
The shot of the toy phone cuts to a near identical shot where the phone is smiling wider and looking at the camera, accompanied by a loud ringing
A large gush of blood spills out of the hall accompanied by a scream. This shot repeats 3 times
The little girl suddenly turns around with blood all over her
Because Sissy is lost in her thoughts, she hits a kangaroo with the car
Sissy stares at the creepy painting and therefore gets scared by Alex coming in
Alex grabs the phone and looks around as she discovers the dead body of Jamie in the grass
Sissy starts hitting herself with her phone
After removing a few towels from under the bed, Emma finds Tracey’s corpse
While Emma is trying to process what happened, Sissy appears in the door behind her
Opening sequence with several rapid-fire jump scares like Leatherface suddenly appearing with high pitched sound effects
Opening sequence with several rapid-fire jump scares like Leatherface suddenly appearing with high pitched sound effects
Opening sequence with several rapid-fire jump scares like Leatherface suddenly appearing with high pitched sound effects
Opening sequence with several rapid-fire jump scares like Leatherface suddenly appearing with high pitched sound effects
Kenny hits someone as he drives off from the gas station
Darryl turns around and is attacked by Leatherface
Darryl looks down a dark hallway and Leatherface suddenly appears out of the darkness and attacks him
Heather closes the closet door and sees a dead woman in the mirror
Leatherface breaks a window with his chainsaw
A rat scuttles away in a neighboring room startling the officer
The officer opens a chest freezer and a screaming Nikki is hiding inside
The officer is attacked by Leatherface
Heather pokes her knife through one of the holes in the barrier startling Carl
Heather reaches out to touch Leatherface but he grabs her wrist
One of the ghost kids suddenly appears (loud noise, during a pan to the right
One of the ghost kids is floating in the air (cut, loud noise
When the kid is cycling, suddenly the ghost kids appear (cut, loud noise
A window is broken
After we see an extreme closeup of Leah’s face she is suddenly pulled out from under the bed
During a dream sequence, we suddenly see a quick cut of a bloodied mouth accompanied by a loud roar
A car pulls out in front of Casey in the parking garage
Michael breaks a car window with a shovel as Alan calls 911 (we get a small amount of warning beforehand)
Alan suddenly gasps as Casey is talking to Jordan
Michael suddenly opens the door during a tense scene
Jordan sees Michael looking at her through a crack in the door
Jordan knocks out Michael
After a long moment of silent tension, The Riddler lunges at the man with a roar
While Batman and Catwoman are looking into the trunk, loud gunshots suddenly hit the car
In the wide angle shot, someone suddenly appears in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
Batman is startled by a cop who is guarding the crime scene
Matt sees a frightening vision in a basement window
A figure can be seen in a mirror as Sara opens a closet door
Matt turns around to see that the water Sara is mopping the floor with has turned to blood
Some plates fall on the floor and break
Matt gets a shock from the door in the basement
Matt has a vision where his hand sinks through a pillar and gets stuck in rotting meat
Matt begins to have another vision
Sara turns around and is surprised by Matt standing in the doorway
A figure runs past Matt
The door slams behind Matt
One of the corpses in the mortuary begins to move
Several of the tattooed corpses are now standing around Matt
Matt sits up and comes face to face with a burnt figure
The burnt figure disappears in a bright flash
Matt starts to have another vision involving Jonah and Aickman
Wendy wakes up as a bird hits the window
As Wendy goes to lift a sheet covering the bird, a foot suddenly appears in view
Sara turns on the bed-side light and sees a corpse standing in front of her. [Video]
The furnace door shuts as Nicholas tries to examine it
Jonah’s spirit suddenly moves closer to Sara and Matt
Jonah’s spirit now stands right behind Sara and Matt
Nicholas looks in the rear view mirror and sees a burnt corpse
A corpse flashes up on the screen during a flash-back to Jonah
The shower curtain suddenly wraps itself around Wendy
An axehead breaks through the door in front of Wendy
A corpse falls down in front of Matt and Sara

movies.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia

jump_scares.spoiler: The woman in the corner of the room suddenly appears in front of Lisa
Lisa lies down on the bed and her daughter Heidi is revealed to be standing behind her
Andy opens the door and sees a raccoon standing there
Lisa pokes at the bush with a rake and sees a decomposing corpse. [Video]
Lisa sees a woman sitting by the bathtub
Lisa sees a blood covered hand move through the water
During a tense scene, the lights and radio turn back on
A shadowy figure watches Lisa in the kitchen
The decomposing corpse appears directly in front of Lisa as she opens her eyes. [Video]
Joyce sees the silhouette of a woman walking through the trees
Mr Gordy puts his hand on Heidi’s shoulder
Heidi suddenly sees an African American man swinging on the previously empty swing
Heidi sees someone hanging from a tree
After waking from a nightmare, Lisa turns around in bed and sees an African American woman with white eyes looking at her
As Lisa approaches the bathtub, the mummified corpse comes into view
During a vision, Joyce sees Heidi briefly take on a skeletal appearance
Heidi is woken by a loud thump
Heidi sees the spirit of an African American woman pass in front of her as she enters the piano room
A photo-frame with a picture of Heidi in it cracks
After waking from a nightmare, Lisa lies back down and sees a skeleton lying in bed beside her. [Video]
Something walks past Heidi while she is stuck in the hole
The mummified corpse appears in front of Heidi
The light beside Andy crackles, briefly startling him. As Andy walks back inside, a silhouette of a man can be seen watching him
Joyce sees a corpse-like figure appear at the trailer window
The rotting corpse of the stationmaster appears at the car window beside Heidi. [Video]
A man appears behind Lisa while she is looking in a cupboard
While driving Andy sees a female ghost standing on the road, causing him to swerve
Lisa looks back at Joyce who briefly appears as a decomposing corpse
Lisa is startled by various taxidermied animals around her
A mummified body falls on Lisa
As Lisa crawls through the hole, the stationmaster grabs her around the legs
Lisa is pulled through the hole
The rabbit gets runover by a car
The car skids as they brake to avoid a man standing in the road
John suddenly turns toward Grace in the back seat
John hits the windshield hard when Jim suddenly slams on the brakes
A hand smashes through the car window, grabbing Jim
The police officer is shot in the head
John suddenly grabs Grace while in bed
Jim is pulled in half by the truck
John slits the police officer’s throat
A bloodied hand grabs Grace as she looks in the back of the van
Jim kicks The Hitcher out of the moving car
A metal sign falls over with a loud bang
As Jim turns to leave, The Hitcher appears
Jim’s car is suddenly rear-ended
The sound of tires screeching followed by a truck smashing through the closed garage door
A car rushes by on the highway
The Hitcher shoots one of the police officers
The Hitcher bangs his hand on the underside of the table and says ‘bang’
A gunshot
A gunshot
A gunshot
A hooded man walks past Liz in a corridor
There is an abrupt flashback to the four students partying in the shelter
Liz is startled by a knock at the door
Maya closes a cupboard revealing Jurgis behind her in the mirror
As Jesse approaches the motel door there is a loud bang
Sarah suddenly appears in the hallway and attacks Jesse
The sudden appearance of a moth-like figure on the road causes Mary to swerve and crash the car
Mary gasps and appears shocked to see her husband sitting beside her bed
John turns over in bed and has a vision of his wife lying in the bed beside him
John smashes his head into the mirror. [Video]
Damien suddenly appears with vampire like teeth, accompanied by a sound cue
A gorilla slams against the glass, cracking it
Katherine Thorn closes the bathroom cabinet door revealing a demon in the mirror
Father Brennan is impaled by a metal pole
A dog suddenly attacks Robert Thorn
Keith is decapitated
Mrs. Baylock suddenly jumps on Mr. Thorn’s back and attacks him
Mrs. Baylock smashes the car windshield
A body falls onto the concrete in front of Fingerling
Walter slams his fist on a metallic fence
Some birds fly up at Agatha
A loud gunshot
Beth wakes up to a loud noise
A screaming woman runs by in the distance
A woman suddenly appears and runs by Beth
Claire’s foot falls through the wooden floor
The bathroom door slams shut
A bathroom door is suddenly pushed open
